document.full_text: video uploaded to the web by syrian activists shows thousands of protesters on the streets of the city of homs chanting for the end of the assad family dynasty.
document.title: the lede: after funerals for protesters, syrian mourners call for revolution
lines_and_colors: video uploaded to the web by syrian activists shows thousands of protesters on the streets of the city of homs chanting for the end of the assad family dynasty.
